revised_title: The Role of Pulmonary Arterioles in Asphyxia and Anesthetic Action of Pure Nitrogen
tldr: The author investigates the effects of asphyxia and the anesthetic action of pure nitrogen on the cardiovascular system. The study reveals that the arrest of the pulmonary circulation is the immediate cause of death in asphyxia cases, and the pulmonary arterioles play a crucial role in this process.
